name: Padel Point
description: A real daily-use e-commerce made for a company dedicated to selling sports-related products, primarily padel rackets. The company is called Padel Point, and we worked as developers on their system for 3 months, handling tasks such as user logins with OAuth, payment gateways with Stripe, email sending with Resend, and other activities.

name: Ecommerce API Backend
description: This backend is a robust and scalable e-commerce platform developed using NestJS, a progressive Node.js framework for building efficient and reliable server-side applications. It leverages TypeORM for seamless interaction with a MySQL database, utilizing the Repository pattern to ensure a clean separation of concerns. The platform integrates OAuth2 for secure authentication, allowing users to log in using third-party providers. Designed with a modular architecture, it exposes a comprehensive set of RESTful APIs, ensuring high performance and maintainability.

name: Padel store Backend
description: This project is a REST API developed using ASP.NET with C# and Entity Framework, designed for a real-world business specializing in the sale of padel rackets. Although the project was ultimately replaced by a different technology stack, it served as both an academic and professional endeavor. The API was structured to provide robust data management and seamless integration with a MySQL database, leveraging Entity Framework for efficient data operations. The design followed RESTful principles, ensuring clear and consistent communication between client and server. Despite its eventual replacement, the project demonstrated key skills in API development and database management.

name: Searching job tool
description: RRHH Message Tool is a web application built with React that helps users quickly generate personalized job-related messages. Designed for developers, freelancers, and professionals actively applying to multiple positions, the tool makes it easy to create tailored cover letters, thank-you notes, and first contact messages. It features dynamic templates and options to download messages as .txt files or send them directly via WhatsApp.
